entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HTTP3 QUIC - client over Cronet sends CertificateUnknown and closes QUIC listener #45482
  • Perf improvement: json #45481
  • QuickGrid: Support sorting with a custom comparer. #45478
  • QuickGrid: Add API to specify a custom class for <tr>. #45477
    Backlog
  • ReadOnly exception from dotnet core middleware - Kubernetes container pods with a read-only filesystem #45476
  • [AOT] Fix hosting/HTTP/server/middleware/routing/auth AOT warnings #45473

Closed

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, mvc #45464
  • Sending a request with empty body to an endpoint with a filter, returns the `Task` result on the response bdy when running with the Production environment #45432
  • Perf regression: mapaction #45465
  • Authentication Builder Update #45452
    Discussions
  • Dotnet 7 Javascript API : pass ElementReference as parameter #45416
  • EndpointMiddleware should not catch exceptions #45180
    8.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove allocation of logger name from constructor of Renderer #45480
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Skip test that creates symlink on Windows #45479
    8.0-preview1
  • Remove framework boxing in Minimal when writing Json #45472
    Perf, area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Enable nullable reference types in analyzer projects #45454
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Regenerating src/SignalR/clients/ts/common/yarn.lock #45470
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview1
  • Update CODEOWNERS #45391
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • Fix endpoint Middlweware #45460
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Warn the user if they're specifying protocols that won't be used #45352
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Cleanup Mvc Analyzers #42754
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Resolve all descriptors from registry #45436
    area-grpc
  • Support `sub` as `ExternalLoginInfo.ProviderKey` #45198
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Fix ControllerLinkGeneratorExtensions throw ArgumentException #43845 #45467
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Vectorized HttpCharacters (and used IndexOfAnyValues in other places found) #45300
    Perf, blocked, area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Remove obsolete classes #45466
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Hosting] Add {OriginalFormat} to start & stop log state objects #45253
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2061560 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure
  • Introduce non-virtual RegisterTokenProviderCore method. #45413
    area-identity
